title: How many US quarters are there? - Quora

response.answer_text: There is a quarter for each of the 50 states. There is also one for DC and for Puerto Rico, making 52. There are more, however. In 2010, the USA started a project that would add 56 more quarters. They've nearly finished it, having currently added 50 of them. There is also the generic quarter. Currently, there are 103 quarters, but in 2021 there will be 109. Edit: I am assuming you meant types of quarters (with unique designs), not the literal number of quarters that have been manufactured.

No one knows exactly, because no one keeps track of the quarters which are melted or otherwise destroyed. But you can start with mintage figures here: Washington quarter mintage figures - Wikipedia For older series, you can check a reference work such as the Red Book. https://www.amazon.com/2019-Official-United-States-Coins/dp/0794845711
Usually there are 4 quarters to a whole. Four quarters in football and basketball games. Four quarters in a dollar. I cut fruit into 4 quarters and sometimes in 8ths too.
